title: Community Search for Missing Elder
description: Join a coordinated search effort to locate a missing elderly man last seen near the riverbank.

title: Awareness Flyers for Missing Children
description: Help distribute flyers across the Bole and Sar Bet areas to raise awareness.

title: Volunteer Training Workshop
description: A training session for new volunteers on effective search and rescue methods.

title: Call Center Support
description: Assist in taking and logging reports from the public regarding missing persons.
